articles.title: Full flights for AirAsia to Langkawi - The Star Online
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: AirAsia’s first service from Kuala Lumpur to Langkawi yesterday morning under the tourism bubble recorded a 100% flight load, signifying a strong rebound for domestic air travel.
articles.content:

articles.title: Asian shares fall on Chinese developers' woes - The Star Online
articles.description: HONG KONG: Falls in Chinese property stocks pushed Asian shares down for a fourth day on Thursday, reversing initial gains, while the dollar was in the doldrums floating within its recent range.
articles.content:

articles.title: North Korea, nuclear proliferation and why the 'madman theory' is wrong about Kim Jong-un - The Conversation UK
articles.description: North Korea’s test of two new missile systems have stoked fears of a nuclear confrontation in Asia. But the North Korean leader may not be as unstable as he is made out.
articles.content: The two missile tests conducted by North Korea in recent days have reopened discussions about the country, its leadership, its foreign policy, its perception around the world and the use (and usefuln… [+5699 chars]
